title: Forescout System Logs and Events
description: This dashboard provides insights into system logs, license alerts, login activity, and system status.

definition.content:
This dashboard offers a comprehensive overview of system logs and events, including license alerts, login activity, and overall system status to ensure continuous monitoring and operational health.

For more information, see the [Forescout Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/forescout/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
